description: This file defines a Flutter widget named CategoryPieChart that visualizes category spending breakdowns as a pie chart using the fl_chart package. It processes a list of CategoryBreakdownItem instances to generate chart sections, colors, and labels, and provides a visual representation of expenses by category.

classes.name: CategoryPieChart
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a pie chart of category breakdowns.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the pie chart, calculating total spent and creating sections for each category with spent greater than zero.

methods.name: _chartColor
methods.description: Returns a color from a predefined palette based on index, with adjusted opacity.
